description: Client side event fired when a user clicks on any content in the feed (Forecast or Surf).

category.description: The event category (used to group related events).

contentType.description: The content type of the content accessed by the module click..

isPremium.description: Whether the module click takes the user to content for premium users only.

isSponsoredArticle.description: Whether the module click takes the user to a sponsored article.

isVideo.description: Whether the module click takes the user to a video.

location.description: Where the event fired on our application.

postSeries.description: The post series of the content accessed by the module click.

postcategory.description: The event category (used to group related events).

screenName.description: The screen name when the module was clicked.

tags.description: Any tags associated with the content accessed by the module click.

title.description: The title of the content accessed by the module click.
